title: New Malzahar skin?! Meow'zahar?!
body:
Plans for new Malzahar skin leaked from Riot- Meow'zahar!

* Malzahar's spell shield _void shift_ (passive) will appear as a cat shape, complete with cat ears and whiskers
*  _Call of the void_ (Q) will look like 2 kittens pouncing inward toward target location 
* Malzahar's _voidlings_ (W) will obviously be little **kittenlings**
*  _Malefic visions_ (E) appears as a ball of yarn on the target (to which the **kittenlings **would obviously be attracted) 
*  _Nether Grasp_ (R) features Malzahar suppressing his target as normal BUT the pool of energy underneath the target is a portal with kittens pulling the target down. 

The new skin will be classified as a legendary skin- 1820 RP with plans for chroma bundle and icon set at 3200 RP. The date of release is currently set for never since Riot already has too much money and this skin would obviously make them so rich that they literally would not know what to do with themselves. RIP meow'zahar. 

{{champion:90}}

replies.body: It cant be worse than Meowkai's cat-dragon wave.
Hahaha the "meows" are the only thing that make the kitten wave tolerable.
I would buy it. Not for the quality of the skin. Only for the wordplay in the name. Same with Kitty Katarina

Lmao it just rolls off the tongue. I definitely got kitty cat katarina for that exact reason. 

Alright but what if they made meowzahar's recall animation super legit?
Errr reported for being a tease. I was so into this- annnnd then I realized you were trolling. But seriously this isnt a leak?

No it's not actually a leak bro, sorry. If you report me maybe Riot will be forced to check it out though? lolol

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Omg!! This needs to be made!!! I love kittens!! <3 it wouldn't be such a lost to be taken down by kittens~
It would be a purrrfect death :3
Please, no kitten puns. Let's try to keep this a serious conversion or else it will quickly become a CATastrophe.

Ehhh.....It just seems like a joke that will get old fast.Like Meowkai.Sure it was fun for a while but the cat theme adds nothing to both characters.And all the particle changes in the world will not fix how "flat" this skin could be.Compare this to overlord malzahar.It was a simple theme,but it added a lot to his character,turning him from a mage that wants to conquer the world to a person that actually conquered the world.Meowzahar adds nothing to him.It will just feel tacked on.This is why almost nobody buys joke skins anymore.Most joke skins just feel like costumes put onto the champions,instead of something that the champion would actually look like.For a malzahar joke skin,I would like to see,'definitely not victorious malzahar'.It would be like the normal malzahar,but tones the power f his abilities down (lore-wise) so that he fails at everything he does,still keeping his serious attitude.Imagine him saying "I shall use my minions to engulf this world in darkness.."only to summon some retarded looking mutant frog that rams it's head into the opponent until it explodes.This skin would still keep the character of malzahar but make him into more of a comical character.

100% agree. It's pretty hit and miss with many of the skins that get released. TBH though I feel like Riot doesnt particularly care about whether or not a skin adds to the lore or fits the story/character/attitude. Yeah meowkai got old real quick but I bet you Riot made a ton of money off of it (they even created chromas to milk it even further). But I agree I think there are lots of other great ideas for malz skins that might fit him better.
Honestly you just need to get a Riot member to see this and we are good to go.
Maybe the Rito gods will shine on us
